verbs.description: Just a day after [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: decided] [ARG1: to withdraw the U.S. from the Iran nuclear deal] , Saudi Arabia said that they would do anything they can to obtain nuclear weapons if their regional rival Iran does the same .
